description: black ink painting of bamboo stalks and leaves; dull yellow silk mount; dark wood knobs; woven hanging cord; medium stain wood box with lid
inscription: Japanese writing in black ink at BR; very light writing in Japanese on verso BL; sticker on end of R roller knob: KOGYO / TAKENOZU / #Y-9; sticker on side of R roller knob: T-9 [illeg.] / Koyo / Takanozo
markings: red seal at BR; label in Japanese on verso at T; paper tag in Japanese, verso top dowel
signed: 廣業; red seal 廣業
title: Bamboo
